EmailTemplate.name: 18-GEPS TO-Partner-C00056.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Business incentives to fuel your sales activities
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nokia Global Partner Program Working with Nokia just got more financially rewarding.
Did you know that the Global Partner Program rewards partners who build their Nokia competencies, hunt for new business, and attach maintenance services to their deals? Discounts are applied to Nokia’s partner product list price, which allows you to offer your enterprise customers the best value for their money.
Watch the video to learn more about the business incentives that pay back BIG!
Contact your Nokia partner sales manager should you have questions. Nokia Partner Marketing & Communications Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
